Title: Bigtime
Plot: Carrie and Al?s reputation for closing cases results in an offer to join the Major Crimes Section of the NYPD.  But when their first case ? a high-profile child kidnapping ? hits close to home for Carrie, it leaves her wondering if a move from Queens to Manhattan is what?s best for her.
GuestStars: Andrew McCarthy, Bianca Amato, Ella Rubin, John Scurti, Danny Johnson
